ValidationRule.description: In the "UK" record type, if the AML status is set to "Approve," then Listing is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "UK", ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Approved') , ISBLANK( Listing__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When AML is Approved then Listing is required
